description: Stores or retrieves stored chat messages from Langflow tables or an external memory.

mode.info: Operation mode: Store messages or Retrieve messages.

message.info: The chat message to be stored.

external_memory.info: Retrieve messages from an external memory. If empty, it will use the Langflow tables.

sender.info: The sender of the message. Might be Machine or User. If empty, the current sender parameter will be used.

session_id.info: The session ID of the chat. If empty, the current session ID parameter will be used.

template.info: The template to use for formatting the data. It can contain the keys {text}, {sender} or any other key in the message data.

success.message_stored: Message stored successfully for sender '{sender}' in session '{session_id}'

errors.no_messages_stored: No messages were stored. Please ensure that the session ID and sender are properly set.
errors.invalid_external_memory: External Memory object ({memory_name}) must have 'aget_messages' method.
errors.text_formatting_failed: Failed to format messages as text: {error}
